data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Betis's half?
Corner awarded to Betis.
Important block from the Bilbao defence as Antonio Sanabria fires in a strike for Betis.
In the minute 5, Betis have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
In Bilbao Bilbao attack through Mikel Vesga. The finish is off target, however.
Betis have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Ball safe as Bilbao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a Bilbao throw-in in Betis's half.
In the minute 9, Victor Ruiz blunders with an own goal. This makes it 1-0.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Betis.
In Bilbao Betis's Victor Ruiz is caught offside.
In the minute 15, Can Bilbao capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Betis's half?
Throw-in for Betis in their own half.
Free kick for Bilbao in the half of Betis.
In the minute 16, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a throw-in for Bilbao, close to Betis's area.
Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Betis.
Bilbao have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Betis at San Mames.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Betis in their own half.
Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in Bilbao.
Bilbao to take a throw-in in Betis territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Betis.
Bilbao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Betis drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 26, Betis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Betis.
In the minute 28, Betis have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
Throw-in Bilbao.
Ball goes out of play for a Bilbao goal kick.
In the minute 31, Betis pushes forward through Joaquin, whose finish on goal is saved.
Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Bilbao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 33, Goal! Bilbao increase their lead to 2-0 through a well-placed header from Ander Capa.
Betis are whistled for offside.
Bilbao push forward at San Mames and Inaki Williams gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Betis defence.
In the minute 37, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Betis in their own half.
Bilbao drive upfield and Mikel Vesga gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Betis defender.
Free kick for Betis in their own half.
In the minute 40, Inaki Williams for Bilbao drives towards goal at San Mames. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Betis are caught offside.
Bilbao are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 43, Bilbao to take a throw-in in Betis territory.
Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Betis's half?
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Betis at San Mames.
At San Mames the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Bilbao will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Betis.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Bilbao.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
In the minute 47, Javier Alberola Rojas awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
Goal kick for Betis at San Mames.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Betis close to the penalty box.
Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Betis in Bilbao.
In the minute 52, In Bilbao, Rodri of Betis is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Cristian Tello (Betis) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In Bilbao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bilbao's Asier Villalibre gets in a shot on goal at San Mames. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 57, Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Iker Muniain extends Bilbao's lead to 3-0 in Bilbao with a header.
In the minute 61, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a Bilbao throw-in in Betis's half.
Loren Moron is on a sub for William Carvalho for Betis.
The away team replace Cristian Tello with Borja Iglesias.
Manuel Pellegrini (Betis) is making a third substitution, with Andres Guardado replacing Antonio Sanabria.
In the minute 63, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a Bilbao throw-in in Betis's half.
Can Betis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bilbao's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bilbao.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Bilbao in their own half.
Bilbao needs to be cautious. Betis have an attacking throw-in.
Guido Rodriguez (Betis) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Betis in the half of Bilbao.
Free kick for Bilbao in the half of Betis.
Great finish from Alex Berenguer to give Bilbao a 4-0 lead.
In the minute 68, Yuri Berchiche instrumental with a fine assist.
Betis to take a throw-in in Bilbao territory.
The home team have replaced Iker Muniain with Oihan Sancet. This is the first substitution made today by Gaizka Garitano.
In the minute 70, Jon Morcillo is replacing Alex Berenguer for the home team.
Diego Lainez is replacing Joaquin for Betis at San Mames.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Betis in the half of Bilbao.
Betis have a dangerous throw-in.
Betis's Loren Moron gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bilbao defender.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards Betis a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Bilbao make their third substitution with Raul Garcia replacing Inaki Williams.
Free kick Betis.
In the minute 78, Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
In the minute 80, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Betis to take a throw-in in Bilbao territory.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
In the minute 84, Aitor Ruibal is on a sub for Rodri for Betis.
Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Betis's half?
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
In the minute 86, In Bilbao Bilbao drive forward through Ander Capa. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a Bilbao throw-in in Betis's half.
Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Dani Garcia is replacing Yuri Berchiche for the home team.
At San Mames, Bilbao are penalized for being offside.
The home team replace Asier Villalibre with Inigo Lekue.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Betis.
Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Betis's half?
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a Betis throw-in in Bilbao's half.
In Bilbao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Bilbao are whistled for offside.
Javier Alberola Rojas blows to end the match. The final score is 4-0.
